name: Ekaterina An
title: Advisor & Event Organizer
bio: Hello! I'm Kat, an Institute of Medical Science alum and first-year nursing student at U of T. Having been on Raw Talk from the very first episode, it's been incredibly rewarding to watch the show grow over the seasons and to learn anything and everything about producing a podcast. This season promises to continue the trend of excellent science storytelling with lots of unique, fun, and informative content coming your way!
